reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for a small mirror like this for my office desk, and this works perfectly! It stands just fine on its own, and I like that it can move up and down to adjust. It is sturdy and doesn't fall over easily. I like that it's a dual sided mirror; One side is 1x and the other is 2x magnification. The first one that I received came broken, but the replacement works great. I love this mirror and would recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It looks so sleek and nice plus a magnifying mirror on the back for makeup

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price!
reviews.reviewText: This product serves it's purpose! The only downside is it's kind of flimsy. Aside from that, it's a great deal for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice product. I took pictures of it standing straight on the leg trying to display how the 2x looks compared to regular but not sure it shows. Anyway the leg swivels well and props the mirror nicely to the desired spot but isn't so loose that it always falls to the lowest setting or anything like that. I got the black border and it looks nice. Not too thick of a frame that it takes up too much space, either. The mirror is shows a good clear reflection and is perfect for any space. I put it on my desk at work and it works great there. It's very portable but keep in mind once you throw away the bubble wrap there's no cover to protect the mirror part if you have it in a bag or something. I'm very happy with this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Cheap, flimsy plastic
reviews.reviewText: Arrived broken, and it was no surprise once I held it. This is made with cheap, thin plastic that snaps easily. The base can’t hold much weight, and the mirror would probably fall over all of the time. I don’t believe this would last long or function well even if it arrived intact, given how weak and narrow the base is.If you do purchase this, I suggest you wrap some duct tape or something around the base to reinforce and widen it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Functional mirror but could be improved
reviews.reviewText: I needed a mirror for my work desk and this works. I wish it had 2 legs instead of 1, as adjusting it requires 2 hands and sometimes if I'm putting on make-up I would have liked to move it using only one hand. Also, with only 1 leg, if I accidentally bump something into it, it will fall over. At full price, I don't think it's better than a mirror that you can get at Target or somewhere else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This mirror is perfect for me to pluck hair for my face I can hold it in my hand it is large enough to view my whole face and I am satisfied

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Vanity Mirror
reviews.reviewText: I have been on a bit of a quest to find the perfect (for me) adjustable angle vanity magnifying mirror. This one comes very, very close. I need a mirror that I can get very close to so I can apply eye makeup (without my reading glasses) and also to see those tricky little grooming areas on the face. I don’t have room in front of my vanity to sit down so I have been bending over a small magnifying mirror for a long time.This mirror is great because it doesn’t take up much room on my counter and also has a two way mirror that spins 360°. One side is normal and the other is 2x magnification. This is my only concern, and the reason for removing a star. Even a 5x would have been much better, 10x perfect, but 2x is a stretch for me. However, the rest of it is practically perfect. I love how the mirror stays in place indefinitely at the angle you leave it. And yet you can move it to any angle you want.It doesn’t have illumination but frankly I think that’s a waste. My bathroom has all the light I need.And at this price, I didn’t expect my problem to be solved this well. I wish I could give it 4 3/4 stars.
